Operator# -=(_:_:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static func -= (lhs: inout Self, rhs: Self.Stride)
```

Available when `Self` conforms to `_Pointer`.
